VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silver Screen Sanctuary relative to Azure Vista Cinema?
SRP.A: Silver Screen Sanctuary is {below} Azure Vista Cinema in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Picture House}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starlight Studios}.

VE.Q: What are the cinema attendance of Starlight Studios, Azure Vista Cinema, and Silver Screen Sanctuary in 1984?
VE.A: Starlight Studios's cinema attendance is {990624.78} tickets, Azure Vista Cinema's cinema attendance is {3049874.01} tickets, Silver Screen Sanctuary's cinema attendance is {1273076.69} tickets.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Meridian Picture House} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Silver Screen Sanctuary, Zenith Multiplex, Starlight Studios, Aethelgard Film Palace, Azure Vista Cinema, The Grand Celestial, Meridian Picture House}.
